title: Thypoch Expands its 35mm and 28mm Lenses to Z, E, X, and RF Mounts
description: Thypoch, which debuted with Leica M mount, is expanding its camera support to Nikon Z, Fujifilm X, Sony E, and Canon RF.
content: Thypoch, which debuted as a brand last September with the Simera 35mm f/1.4 and Simera 38mm f/1.4 lenses for Leica M-mount, is expanding its camera support to Nikon Z, Fujifilm X, Sony E, and Canon RF. The company says its choice to expand beyond Lei... [2082 chars]

title: I Bought a 50-Year-Old Film Camera, and I Think You Should Too
description: Photographer John Bilbao shares how he purchased a 50-year-old camera, the Nikon F2, to jump back into film and rediscover his passion.
content: When I was a freshman in high school, I signed up for a film photography class thinking it would be a good excuse to spend a good part of the school week and some homework time getting to goof around with a camera. By that point, I had already comman... [8452 chars]

title: Handheld digital cameras are back, thanks to TikTok
description: Retro digital cameras from Nikon and Canon are popular again. Here’s why I think these cameras are worth the hype.
content: In a narrow hallway that divides the dance floor and the bathrooms at a local club, I saw some girls snapping photos. Instead of an iPhone, one of them held a retro digital camera above the group’s heads at an angle. The flash went off and I squeezed... [4053 chars]

title: Nikon Launches New Self-Service Repair Program for Select Products
description: Nikon now provides access to parts and instructions that allow photographers to make repairs to their own products at home.
content: Nikon now provides access to parts and instructions that allow photographers to make repairs to their own products at home instead of needing to rely on the company’s official service departments. In a newly launched section of the Nikon USA website,... [3573 chars]
